backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend-related features and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global background/text defaults.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO meta tags, font preconnects, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Registers client-side routes and wraps pages in AppLayout and ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/about/DividerFea: Renders a vertical list of features separated by dividers.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamMember: Layout component for team member info with optional reversed orientation and placeholder image area.
frontend/src/components/common/NumberTic: Animated number counter triggered on scroll using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/common/PageTrans: Wraps content with fade or fade-slide page transition respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/components/common/RevealOnS: Scroll-triggered reveal animation wrapper with optional delay and variant styles.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Dropdown accordion allowing users to select a legal service with error styling and click-to-toggle behavior.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and reload option when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with contact info, social links, and smooth-scrolling quick navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: Section describing the firm and its approach, listing key values and linking to the About page.
FAQ accordion with keyboard support and embedded JSON-LD schema for SEO.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Final call‑to‑action prompting users to schedule a consultation and navigate to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero carousel with preloaded background images, seamless looping, and a button linking to the contact section.
Responsive navbar with scroll detection, section navigation, mobile menu, and contact button.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Timeline‑based section outlining the firm’s five‑step legal process.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersMar: Displays a looping marquee of partner cards by duplicating the list for seamless animation.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Renders a partners section with a header and passes a static partners list to the marquee component.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Shows a grid of legal services with icons and navigation actions to services and contact pages.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Implements a horizontally scrolling testimonials carousel with auto-scroll and manual navigation controls.
Displays a testimonials section header and embeds the testimonials carousel with preset data.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Presents trust indicators with icons and animated number counters in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main layout with navbar, page transitions, and scroll restoration on route or hash changes.
frontend/src/components/reui/timeline.ts: Provides a set of timeline UI components with orientation support and shared context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberTicker.ts: Implements an animated counter hook that eases from 0 to a target number when visible.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadImages.ts: Preloads image URLs and tracks when the first or all images have finished loading or errored.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes actor and fetching state from useActor as a placeholder for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, typography, and component utility classes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the firm’s mission, values, team members, and distinguishing features with navigation helpers and animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation, simulated submission, service selection, and animated hero section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage from multiple section components with scroll‑reveal animations and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 page with a message and button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports a list of service definitions with names, icons, and descriptions for rendering on the Services page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with a hero section, a grid of services from servicesData, and navigation to the contact page.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Implements a simple client-side router with path registration, navigation, listeners, and a React hook for route updates.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, fonts, and utility settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s metadata, features, requirements, and current state related to setting the uploaded image as the Services page hero background.
